full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAN CHEN NO MIN GYI SPRUL SKU'I ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS BSAM DON LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI ^MKHAN CHEN NO MIN GYI SPRUL SKU'I ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS BSAM DON LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES MA NU DMAR PO YUG GCIG RAB DKAR LHA RDZAS 'DON GNYIS LNGAN BCAS DGA' LDAN BDE LDAN GLING GI PHYAG MDZOD PA MKHAN SLOB SER SKYA THUN MONG NAS NAN CHER BSKUL MA 'BYUNG NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I RIGS SU LUGS 'DZIN PA ^RJE BTZUN NGAG DBANG CHOS RJE DBANG PHYUG 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSOS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS LPA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DGE'O, ,)
